Question
========

Given are two proportions 0.30 and 0.37 with 100 and 150 subjects in each group. Give the 95% confidence interval for the difference (0.30 - 0.37) between two proportions in the population.

Answerlist
----------

* (-0.188, 0.048)
* (-0.118, 0.118)
* (-0.07, 0.07)

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* (-0.188, 0.048): Correct
* (-0.118, 0.118): Incorrect
* (-0.07, 0.07): Incorrect
